{{also|stock|Stöck|-stock|stock-}} ==English== {{wikipedia|Stock, Essex}} ===Proper noun=== {{en-proper noun}} # A [[village]] in [[Essex]], [[England]]. # {{surname|en}} ===Anagrams=== * {{anagrams|en|a=ckost|'tocks|tocks}} [[Category:en:Villages in England]] ---- ==Central Franconian== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|gmw-cfr|gmh|stoc}}, from {{inh|gmw-cfr|goh|stoc}}, from {{inh|gmw-cfr|gem-pro|*stukkaz}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|gmw-cfr|/ʃtɔk/}} ===Noun=== {{head|gmw-cfr|noun|g=m|plural|Stöck|or|Stäck|diminutive|Stöckelche|or|Stäckelche}} # {{lb|gmw-cfr|most dialects}} [[stick]]; [[staff]] # {{lb|gmw-cfr|most dialects}} [[floor]]; [[storey]]; [[level]] ====Usage notes==== * The inflected forms with ''-ö-'' are Ripuarian, those with ''-ä-'' are Moselle Franconian. ---- ==German== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|stoc}}, from {{inh|de|goh|stoc}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*stukkaz}}.. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ʃtɔk/}} * {{audio|de|De-Stock.ogg|Audio}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|m||gen2=Stockes|Stöcke|pl2=Stöcker|Stöckchen}} # [[stick]], [[staff]], broken-off [[twig]] #:{{ux|de|Ich weiss nicht, wo ich den '''Stock''' gelassen habe; haben Sie ihn nicht gesehen?|I don't know where I've left the staff; haven't you seen it? }} # [[floor]], [[storey]] (''UK''), [[story]] (''US''), [[level]] #: {{uxi|de|im dritten '''Stock'''|on the third '''floor''' (UK counting)/fourth '''floor''' (US counting)}} # [[stock]], [[supply]] (but only in some contexts and much less common than in English) # {{lb|de|card games}} pile of [[undealt]] [[cards]], deck # the entirety of [[roots]] of a plant; [[stock]] # {{lb|de|short for {{l|de|Bienenstock}}}} [[hive]]; [[beehive]] ====Usage notes==== * The standard plural is {{m|de|Stöcke}}. * The alternative plural {{m|de|Stöcker}} is used in northern and eastern Germany (chiefly in colloquial usage). =====Declension===== {{de-decl-noun-m|(e)s|pl=Stöcke}} =====Synonyms===== * {{sense|stick}} {{l|de|Stab}} * {{sense|storey}} {{l|de|Etage}}; {{l|de|Stockwerk}} * {{sense|deck of cards}} {{l|de|Talon}} * {{sense|tree trunk}} {{l|de|Stumpen}}; {{l|de|Stumpf}} ====Derived terms==== {{der3|de |Bienenstock |Gehstock |Holzstock |Weinstock |Rebstock |Rohrstock |Spazierstock |Viehtreiberstock |Viehstock |Zeigestock |stockgerade |Stockkampf |Stockwerk |Stöckchen }} ===See also=== * {{l|de|steif wie ein Stock}} ---- ==Hunsrik== ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|hrx|/ʃtok/}} ===Noun=== {{head|hrx|noun|g=m|plural|Steck|diminutive|Steckche}} # [[stick]] # [[bush]], [[shrub]] # tree trunk ===Noun=== {{head|hrx|noun|g=m|plural|Steck}} # [[apartment]], [[flat]] ===Further reading=== * [https://hunsriqueanoriograndense.wordpress.com/dicionario-werterbuch/ Online Hunsrik Dictionary]
